name: Akito's Spooky Adventures
description:
Welcome to a very spooky adventure! Join Akito on his adventure across the Spooky Valley to track down the evil Cat and defeat him. Fight off evil tires, springs, and ghosts in this 6-level adventure!

Controls:

Keyboard:

 Z, Space, or W to Jump

  X, CTRL, or E to use Aura 

 Arrow keys, or WASD to Move

Controller

 A/X to Jump

 B/Circle or L2 to use Aura

 D-Pad or Control Stick to Move

Abilities:

Wall Jump - Jump while next to a wall

Pounce (Gold Aura Only) - Press use aura button while on ground or in air.

Glide (Ghost Aura Only) - Press and hold use aura button while in the air to glide.

Super Jump (Ghost Aura Only) - Press and hold use aura button while on the ground.
